vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.loseWager (patch_9.sol#120-124) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- whale.transfer(amount) (patch_9.sol#122)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (patch_9.sol#81-101) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: uint256 wager = wagers[msg.sender];
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play.wager (local variable @ patch_9.sol#85) shadows:
	- PoCGame.wager (function @ patch_9.sol#71-79)
